body.p: CASE.—Corporal David A. Chandler, Co. B, 126th Ohio Volunteers, aged 22 years. SpottsylvaniaSpotsylvania, Virginia, May 12th, 1864. Conoidal musket ball. Treated at corps, Emory, Summit House, Satterlee, Camp Chase, and Tripler hospitals. Transferred to Veteran Reserve Corps March 15th, 1865. Not on Pension List.
